MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:58pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Gilloch Drive substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:17pm on Thursday, 19 November 2020
